author: Chantelle Gabino
description: Chantelle’s inspiration: In an effort to connect, listen and help one another, Cambiar: A Cocktail for Change, strives to promote and instigate positive changes not only within our bars, but also in our communities. Created and inspired by the life stories of Chantelle Gabino, the Bacardí family and imminent and infinite themes of change, Cambiar hopes to create a positive narrative of support around charged topics that are often avoided in social settings. By way of fundraising, advocacy, and mentorship; Cambiar is a cocktail that can unite the masses while showcasing that how you adapt to or perceive change can mean all the difference in defining your legacy.
name: Cambiar
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)

recipeInstructions.text: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
